message.name: ERR_CURRENCYEXCHANGE_XFV_FROM_DATE_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Start date is greater than End date. Please ensure that the Start date is before the End date.

message.name: ERR_PUBLICOFFICE_XRV_CONCERN_PREFERRED
message.locale: A Public Office cannot be canceled while it is still the preferred office for a Concern Role.
A Public Office cannot be cancelled while it is still the preferred office for a Concern Role.

message.name: ERR_PUBLICOFFICE_XRV_NOMINEES_PREFERRED
message.locale: A Public Office cannot be canceled while it is still the preferred office for a Nominee.
A Public Office cannot be cancelled while it is still the preferred office for a Nominee.

message.name: ERR_PUBLICOFFICE_XRV_CONCERN
message.locale: A Public Office cannot be closed while it is still the preferred office for a Concern Role.

message.name: ERR_PUBLICOFFICE_XRV_NOMINEES
message.locale: A Public Office cannot be closed while it is still the preferred office for a Nominee.
